column4: hi, im using 5.10 breezy. But i cannot install anything using my Package Manager.. Apparently it seems that the Breezy repos are all unavailable

from your version there's no easy method.  Backup your data from the /home directory, reformat and reinstall.  When reinstalling it's a good idea to create a seperate partition just for /home.  It makes upgrading easier in the future.  Download and burn the latest ISO and go for it..
